languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, мои люди оцепили отсек, где находятся бастующие, включая их лидеров. Мы держим ситуацию под контролем, насколько позволяют ресурсы".
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, my people have locked down the bay where the strikers are, including their leaders. We have the situation under control as far as resources allow."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, мои люди оцепили отсек, где находятся бастующие, включая их лидеров. Мы держим ситуацию под контролем, насколько позволяют ресурсы".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, my people have locked down the bay where the strikers are, including their leaders. We have the situation under control as far as resources allow."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, my people have locked down the bay where the strikers are, including their leaders. We have the situation under control as far as resources allow."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, my people have locked down the bay where the strikers are, including their leaders. We have the situation under control as far as resources allow."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, my people have locked down the bay where the strikers are, including their leaders. We have the situation under control as far as resources allow."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: “大人，我的人已经锁定了罢工人员所在的区域，他们的领头人也找到了。我们已经在资源允许的情况下控制住了局势。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, my people have locked down the bay where the strikers are, including their leaders. We have the situation under control as far as resources allow."

traits.locale_text: “大人，我的人已经锁定了罢工人员所在的区域，他们的领头人也找到了。我们已经在资源允许的情况下控制住了局势。”
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, mis hombres han sellado la bahía donde están todos los huelguistas, líderes incluidos. Tenemos la situación bajo control hasta donde nos permiten los recursos».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, my people have locked down the bay where the strikers are, including their leaders. We have the situation under control as far as resources allow."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, mis hombres han sellado la bahía donde están todos los huelguistas, líderes incluidos. Tenemos la situación bajo control hasta donde nos permiten los recursos».
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: 「陛下、部下がストライキ参加者のいるベイを、リーダーも含めて封鎖しました。資源が許す限り、事態の掌握は続けられます」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, my people have locked down the bay where the strikers are, including their leaders. We have the situation under control as far as resources allow."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、部下がストライキ参加者のいるベイを、リーダーも含めて封鎖しました。資源が許す限り、事態の掌握は続けられます」
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, meine Leute haben die Bucht abgeriegelt, in der sich die Streikenden und deren Rädelsführer befinden. Wir haben die Lage unter Kontrolle, so weit unsere Ressourcen es erlauben."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, my people have locked down the bay where the strikers are, including their leaders. We have the situation under control as far as resources allow."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, meine Leute haben die Bucht abgeriegelt, in der sich die Streikenden und deren Rädelsführer befinden. Wir haben die Lage unter Kontrolle, so weit unsere Ressourcen es erlauben."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, mes hommes ont bouclé le compartiment où les grévistes sont rassemblés avec leurs meneurs. Nous avons la situation en main, du moins autant que nos ressources le permettent. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, my people have locked down the bay where the strikers are, including their leaders. We have the situation under control as far as resources allow."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, mes hommes ont bouclé le compartiment où les grévistes sont rassemblés avec leurs meneurs. Nous avons la situation en main, du moins autant que nos ressources le permettent. »
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, adamlarım grevcilerin olduğu bölmeyi kapattı. Liderleri de içeride. Kaynaklarımızın müsaade ettiği kadarıyla durumu kontrol altına aldık."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, my people have locked down the bay where the strikers are, including their leaders. We have the situation under control as far as resources allow."
